# TRBE System registers
#
# RUN: llvm-mc -triple aarch64 -disassemble < %s | FileCheck %s

# Read from system register
[0x00,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0x20,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0x40,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0x60,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0x80,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0xc0,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]
[0xe0,0x9b,0x38,0xd5]

# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBLIMITR_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBPTR_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBBASER_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBSR_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBMAR_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBTRG_EL1
# CHECK: mrs x0, TRBIDR_EL1

# Write to system register
[0x00,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]
[0x20,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]
[0x40,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]
[0x60,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]
[0x80,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]
[0xc0,0x9b,0x18,0xd5]

# CHECK: msr TRBLIMITR_EL1, x0
# CHECK: msr TRBPTR_EL1, x0
# CHECK: msr TRBBASER_EL1, x0
# CHECK: msr TRBSR_EL1, x0
# CHECK: msr TRBMAR_EL1, x0
# CHECK: msr TRBTRG_EL1, x0
